Docs.summary: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>命名空间包含启用之间进行互操作的类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]技术。 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration>类，可以承载[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]上的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]页面，和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。
实现互操作功能的两个关键类是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>。 你使用的类取决于控件的实现：
- 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>类时必须使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]控制上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]页。
- 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>类时必须使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-基于应用程序。
